message.filecraft.directory_recycled: Directory has been recycled and deleted.
message.filecraft.requested_owner_collap: Requested owner %s to collapse the directory.
message.filecraft.requested_owner_expand: Requested owner %s to expand the directory.
message.filecraft.owner_only_open: Only the owner can open this file on the local machine.
message.filecraft.cannot_open_directory: This is a directory and cannot be opened directly.
message.filecraft.file_open_requested: Requested to open the file on your computer.

message.filecraft.owner_only_bind: Only the owner can bind paths.
message.filecraft.owner_only_move: Only the owner can move this node.
message.filecraft.node_picked_for_move: Node picked for move. Click on a folder node to move it there.
message.filecraft.target_must_be_folder: Target must be a folder node.
message.filecraft.target_owner_mismatch: Target folder must be owned by you.
message.filecraft.cannot_move_to_descend: Cannot move node to its descendant.
